DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether enlarged lymph nodes are present.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to an abnormal (deviating from the norm) or enlarged lymph node (a rounded mass of lymphatic tissue that is surrounded by a capsule of connective tissue) being present.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Deviating from the norm.:A rounded mass of lymphatic tissue that is surrounded by a capsule of connective tissue. Lymph glands filter lymph (lymphatic fluid), and they store lymphocytes (white blood cells). They are located along lymphatic vessels. Also called a lymph node.

Concepts.definition: Deviating in any way from the state, position, structure, condition, behavior, or rule which is considered a norm.

A bean-shaped organ surrounded by a connective tissue capsule. It is part of the lymphatic system and is found throughout the body. It is composed predominantly of lymphocytes and its main function is immune protection.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was the appearance of new palpable lymph nodes documented?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are there new palpable lymph nodes > 1.5 cm not due to tumor flare reaction?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have clinically enlarged (>1 cm) lymph nodes at study entry?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Appearance of new palpable lymph nodes

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have palpable or radiographically suspicious ipsilateral or contralateral axillary, supraclavicular, infraclavicular, or internal mammary nodes, without histologic confirmation that these nodes are negative for tumor?

DataElement.origin: CALGB CRF:Cancer and Leukemia Group B Case Report Form
